title: CANT PLAY RANKED
body: I got 16 champs but i cant play ranked

replies.body: Per the [Unlocking Game Modes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751894-Unlocking-Game-Modes) guide, you need 16 champions in your pool to play ranked.  There's an issue in the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page that's posted Teemo being disabled due to an issue.  As soon as our yordle friend returns to the rift, you won't be able to play ranked unless you unlock another champion.  Let me know if that clears things up!
